title: Rural population share in France 2006 to 2018
summary: Overall Share of the rural population has decreased over the Year.
Share of the rural population is slightly decreasing from 2006 to 2015.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Share of the rural population, about 22.6 was reported at Year 2006
The lowest Share of the rural population, of value 20.3 was reported at Year 2015
